content: Ate fire cake again. Flour and water cooked on a rock. I used to complain about my mother's cooking. I would do unspeakable things for her worst meal right now.
accuracyNote: Fire cake was a documented staple at Valley Forge.
historicalContext: Fire cake - flour and water cooked on hot stones - was the main food for many soldiers during Valley Forge.

content: Cherry blossoms starting. The fish are biting well. My daughter asked why the sky is blue today. I told her to ask her mother because I don't know.
New Year preparations. My mother is making dumplings. I should be helping but the silk order is late and the merchant will be angry. Priorities.
Married Eliza Schuyler. She's far too good for me and I've told her so. She disagrees. I'll spend my life proving she's right. Starting tomorrow. Today we celebrate.
historicalContext: Alexander Hamilton married Elizabeth Schuyler on December 14, 1780.

content: Negotiating peace in Paris. Franklin is charming everyone. Jay is being difficult about boundaries. I'm making lists. We all contribute what we can.
historicalContext: Adams, Franklin, and Jay negotiated the Treaty of Paris. Adams focused on fishing rights, Jay on boundaries.

content: Third winter of the war. At least we have actual supplies this time. Real shoes. I keep looking at them. Just... looking at shoes. War changes you.
My brother came home today. Seven years he was gone. He looks older. We all look older. The children barely recognized him. He cried. We all cried.
Congress passed me over for promotion. Again. Five generals junior to me got advanced. After everything I've done. After Saratoga. Fine. Fine.
historicalContext: Arnold felt consistently slighted by Congress despite his military successes. He began secret negotiations with the British in 1779.

content: Letter from home. Ma says the cow had twins. Pa's gout is worse. My sister is engaged to the Miller boy. Feel like I'm missing everything.
French fleet has the Chesapeake. Cornwallis is trapped. We're marching south. After six years, this might be it. This might actually be it.
historicalContext: Washington learned the French fleet under de Grasse had defeated the British navy and sealed off the Chesapeake, trapping Cornwallis.

content: Captured a British ship. The Serapis. My own ship was sinking as we did it. They asked if I was surrendering. I was not. We won. Barely. My coat is ruined.
historicalContext: The Battle of Flamborough Head. John Paul Jones allegedly replied 'I have not yet begun to fight!' when asked to surrender the sinking Bonhomme Richard.

content: The Prussian drill master arrived. Baron von Steuben. He swears in German, then French, then has someone translate the swears to English. The men love it.
historicalContext: Baron von Steuben arrived at Valley Forge and began training the Continental Army. He famously used colorful language in multiple languages.

content: Moving through Virginia. The countryside is beautiful when it's not actively shooting at you. Greene keeps retreating then counterattacking. Exhausting man.
historicalContext: Cornwallis was pursuing American forces through the South in 1781. Nathanael Greene's strategy of retreat and counterattack wore down British forces.

content: Festival of San Juan. Sold all my tamales by noon. My feet hurt. My back hurts. My hands hurt. But we eat well tonight. This is the trade.
Spring thaw. Everything is mud. The palace gardens look tragic. I'm told the roads are impassable. Good. Fewer visitors.
